StreamerName.label: Streamer Name
StreamerName.tooltip:
Insert your Twitch-Display-Name.

(Needed so that the script is able to ignore gifted-subs made by the streamer.)

Goal.label: Goal
Goal.tooltip: Amount of new/gifted subs needed to advance to the next streak.

GoalIncrement.label: Increment Goal By
GoalIncrement.tooltip:
Increments the Goal by the defined amount, each time a streak is completed.

(Leave at zero to disable.)

AddSub.label: + Sub
AddSub.tooltip: Increments the Sub counter by one.

SubtractSub.label: - Sub
SubtractSub.tooltip: Decrements the Sub counter by one.

AddStreak.label: + Streak
AddStreak.tooltip: Increments the Streak counter by one.

SubtractStreak.label: - Streak
SubtractStreak.tooltip: Decrements the Streak counter by one.

AddToGoal.label: + Goal
AddToGoal.tooltip: Increments the Subs Per Streak goal by one.

SubtractFromGoal.label: - Goal
SubtractFromGoal.tooltip: Decrements the Subs Per Streak goal by one.

ForceRedraw.label: Refresh Overlay
ForceRedraw.tooltip: Refreshes the Overlay in case of rendering issues.
